content: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/77808 should be an easy review, but runs into merge conflicts very quickly. Can someone take a look?
Seems reasonable to me, though I'm not a compiler reviewer.
The new file is so close to 3000 lines, though, that it seems like it'll need splitting itself soon enough.
yeah :/ I guess maybe it could be split into multiple impls?
Well, it seems fine to do the split as they wrote it initially.
Just that it won't defer the problem for long.
(Zulip's UI for editing is painful sometimes.)
